body: How about the other two artists were just guests and asked by the first artist do whatever? It didn't have to be canon, just extras where the guest artists do what they want.

Those are 3 separate stories drawn by 3 separate people.

Oh wait. I think I got it, basically what happened was this girl's boyfriend (Asakara-kun) likes to jerk off to degenerate NTR tier porn, so this girl (yui?) found out and decided to become a pornstar herself so her boyfriend could jerk off to her, afaik, and then it leads to this ending where they both abandon him. I dont know when the black haired bitch gets roped into it, but probably around halfway through the series, and probably for a similar  reason to yui. It just turned into NTR/Group/Degenerate Fetish territory after a couple of years running when the author (presumably) ran out of ideas.
